::Spears::

She sees him throw the knife and moves her arm.  The blade sinks deep 
into her forearm.  She screams and rolls onto her side.  She breaths 
heavily and slowly gets to her knees.  She gingerly takes hold of the 
blade handle and pulls the blade from her arm.  Tears roll down her 
cheeks from the pain. She looks and sees that Serpentor has left. 

She looks around,"Ramulus? Are you alright?"



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, KSLawdogg@c... wrote:
> Serpentor:
> 
> 
> 
> Serpentor smiled evily, seeing Spears down.  Rolling, he stood up, 
his knife 
> in hand.  Throwing it blade first at Spears' abdomen, he dashed for 
the 
> woods, in the direction of the Newcomer base, hoping to leave 
before more 
> Maximals came.
